name: Sudoku - Unity Complete Project
description:
Sudoku is a fun classic puzzle game anyone can play .This game helps you reduce time to build a similar game easy. You do not need to know any programming language to configure and use it. It is very easy to fill it with your own tasks, make UI changes,change your Admod ID start to gain experience in promoting your game and earning money. We will support you until you feel the most satisfaction for this asset.

DOWNLOAD DEMO APK FILE

Requirements :
  • Unity free license version 2020 or later
  • MacOS and Xcode for build iOS
Game Features:
  • This is a completed game designer, sound, effects, gameplay,full resource, full animation, for such a full sound
  • Amazing system level: Over 1000 levels randomly generated puzzles in four different difficulties (Easy, Medium, Hard, Expert).
  • Ads Monetization : Admob, Unity Ads, Facebook Ads integrated (Banner, Interstitial, Video Reward)
  • Rewarded Ads (get Hints, continue game)
  • Unity IAP Systems: Players can purchase Hints on the game store (video guide)
  • Hints Systems: Reveals the proper number in the selected cell.
  • Auto-save:If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
  • GDPR support
  • Theme Systems : Light Mode and Dark Mode that can be set by the player in game
  • Push notification with Onesignal
  • Sounds: Background music and sound effects are included with a settings to mute sounds in the game
  • Multiple screen sizing for most mobile devices
  • Professional and clean code, clean projects
  • Simple and attractive
  • Easy reskin for all platform.
  • New Developer friendly
  • Support multi-platform: Android, iOS, Web Player
  • Support for Unity 2020 or higher
  • Support build 64Bit, API 30, Android 11
  • Support build Android App Bundle (AAB)
  • Documents update online,video guide,visual tutorial, Support 24/7
This pack includes :
  • Full game ready to publish, easy reskined
  • Clear documentation, video guide, demo apk
